column4: Hello guys...well, when i was installing i put my winxp partition to be mount on /winxp but for sure its not been mounted..so anyone know how can i resolve this?
works but this way will mount automatically everytime?
If that worked, it should be in /etc/fstab.  If you edit /etc/fstab make sure that there isn't an option that says noauto for your XP partition.  Other than that it should "Just work(tm)"
